verses.text: <a href="../2-Samuel-8-1/" title="2 Samuel 8:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"And after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them: and David took Methegammah out of the hand of the Philistines.

2 "JESUS_END"And he smote Moab, and measured them with a line, casting them down to the ground; even with two lines measured he to put to death, and with one full line to keep alive. And so the Moabites became David's servants, and brought gifts.

<a href="../2-Samuel-8-3/" title="2 Samuel 8:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3  "JESUS_END"David smote also Hadadezer, the son of Rehob, king of Zobah, as he went to recover his border at the river Euphrates.

4 "JESUS_END"And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven hundred horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: and David houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them for an hundred chariots.

<a href="../2-Samuel-8-5/" title="2 Samuel 8:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"And when the Syrians of Damascus came to succour Hadadezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.
6 "JESUS_END"Then David put garrisons in Syria of Damascus: and the Syrians became servants to David, and brought gifts. And the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.

<a href="../2-Samuel-8-7/" title="2 Samuel 8:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.

<a href="../2-Samuel-8-8/" title="2 Samuel 8:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"And from Betah, and from Berothai, cities of Hadadezer, king David took exceeding much brass.
<a href="../2-Samuel-8-9/" title="2 Samuel 8:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"When Toi king of Hamath heard that David had smitten all the host of Hadadezer,

10 "JESUS_END"Then Toi sent Joram his son unto king David, to salute him, and to bless him, because he had fought against Hadadezer, and smitten him: for Hadadezer had wars with Toi. And Joram brought with him vessels of silver, and vessels of gold, and vessels of brass:

<a href="../2-Samuel-8-11/" title="2 Samuel 8:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"Which also king David did dedicate unto the LORD, with the silver and gold that he had dedicated of all nations which he subdued;

<a href="../2-Samuel-8-12/" title="2 Samuel 8:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"Of Syria, and of Moab, and of the children of Ammon, and of the Philistines, and of Amalek, and of the spoil of Hadadezer, son of Rehob, king of Zobah.
13 "JESUS_END"And David gat him a name when he returned from smiting of the Syrians in the valley of salt, being eighteen thousand men.

<a href="../2-Samuel-8-14/" title="2 Samuel 8:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14  "JESUS_END"And he put garrisons in Edom; throughout all Edom put he garrisons, and all they of Edom became David's servants. And the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.

<a href="../2-Samuel-8-15/" title="2 Samuel 8:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"And David reigned over all Israel; and David executed judgment and justice unto all his people.
16 "JESUS_END"And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud was recorder;
17 "JESUS_END"And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Seraiah was the scribe;
18 "JESUS_END"And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over both the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and David's sons were chief rulers.
